title: Campaigns and Media Usage - Pre-elections Period
name: Campaigns and Media Usage - Pre-elections Period

properties.title: Restriction of Live TV Debates in Batumi
properties.description: Restriction of Live TV Debates in BatumiThe issue with free use of media in # 79 Batumi election district is particularly important. The Ajara TV restricts any live TV debates. According to the information of ISFEDâ€™s LTO not only political parties are restricted from organizing the talk-shows via the local TV, but the representatives of the civil society as well. For example, when ISFED Ajara-Guria coordinator applied to Ajara TV for arrangement of a special talk-show on TV for increasing voter awareness on elections, after citing many reasons and stretching the time, the TV refused to cooperate with the organization. Read more at: http://isfed.ge/pdf/isfed_election_update_I_eng.pdfTime: 2010-05-30 01:32:53Source: ISFEDCategory: Campaigns & Media - Pre-electionDistrict: Batumi

properties.title: Pre-Election Environment Monitoring Report
properties.description:
Pre-Election Environment Monitoring ReportOn April 23 GYLA published the first interim report on the pre-election campaign violations. GYLA is observing pre-election environment in Tbilisi and the following regions of Georgia:
Adjara, Guria, Imereti, Shida Kartli, Kvemo Kartli, Kakheti, Mtskheta-Mtianeti and Tbilisi. Totally, the monitoring is carried out in the capital and 36 municipalities of the country. Read the report at: http://www.gyla.ge/attachments/712_GYLA%20shualeduri%20I%20ENG%2023.04.10.pdf.Time: 2010-05-29 22:08:03Source: GYLACategory: Campaigns & Media - Pre-electionDistrict: Mtatsminda
